name: Umbrella Group (Tracking App)
title: An Mobile App for Umbrella Group (Housing company) in uk
shortDescription: It is a grocery e-commerce shop web and mobile apps application both client side admin. In client app a customer can order with different price facilities such as offer, on order type. In admin side dashboard has different summary on selling.
description: : It’s a custom mobile app for part time and full time employees of Umbrella Group. By login employees give attendance and share their current location. Employee can send message or emergency message (with firebase cloud messaging system) to her manager. Manager can view employee’s activity such as messages, current location on google map, total working hour’s as date, Full route on google map with address and time by specific date. And also can make pdf report of working hour’s as required any date range, route with address and time only single day

name: Buddy’s American Pizza Co
title: A Matrimonial App
shortDescription: It is a website of pizza shop with CMS. Here online order are taken with delivery or Collection. Deliver order only fixed (given in cms) post code. Customer Can re-order. Customer can customize product to order .Different Options are available such as   Create your own, Half-and –Half, Collections and Deals. All option are handled dynamically from admin panel. Customer can pay with credit card also.
description: It is a website of pizza shop with CMS. Here online order are taken with delivery or Collection. Deliver order only fixed (given in cms) post code. Customer Can re-order. Customer can customize product to order .Different Options are available such as   Create your own, Half-and –Half, Collections and Deals. All option are handled dynamically from admin panel. Customer can pay with credit card also

name: Alfie Salad
title: A e-commerce web application for alfie salad limited
shortDescription: It is a grocery e-commerce shop web and mobile apps application both client side admin. In client app a customer can order with different price facilities such as offer, on order type. In admin side dashboard has different summary on selling.
description: It is a grocery e-commerce shop web and mobile apps application both client side admin. In client app a customer can order with different price facilities such as offer, on order type. In admin side dashboard has different summary on selling.  It has ACLfor performing action according to user. For example a user can place orders and also including partial payment option according to client due amount. There are also has report generation such as sales, payment etc. It has driver tracking system.

name: Employee Management System
title: An Employee Management system for a group of company
shortDescription: It is a web application for employee management. It handles employee Registration, Information, Leave management, Promotion, Resignation, User Management with ACL, Assets information tracking and Local Notification Management. Global Admin can create new company inside same application .A company is individuals. Only Global admin can switch different company at one time login
description: It is a web application for employee management. It handles employee Registration, Information, Leave management, Promotion, Resignation, User Management with ACL, Assets information tracking and Local Notification Management. Global Admin can create new company inside same application .A company is individuals. Only Global admin can switch different company at one time login

name: Online Food Ordering Web App (Restaurant)
title: A food ordering system is used over 35 restaurants in uk
shortDescription: It is a website for restaurant’s online food ordering with CMS. Here online order are taken with delivery or Collection. Delivery as distance using postcode options. Different payment system such as PayPal, Nochex, Stripe. All option are handled dynamically from admin panel. Customer can pay with credit card also. It has also API For mobile Apps.
description: It is a website for restaurant’s online food ordering with CMS. Here online order are taken with delivery or Collection. Delivery as distance using postcode options. Different payment system such as PayPal, Nochex, Stripe. All option are handled dynamically from admin panel. Customer can pay with credit card also. It has also API For mobile Apps.
